mapper.select: insert into notice_tmp(id, ganmao, wendu, cid) values(null, #{ganmao}, #{wendu}, #{cid});
mapper.update: UPDATE notice, notice_tmp SET notice.ganmao = CASE WHEN notice.ganmao <> notice_tmp.ganmao THEN notice_tmp.ganmao ELSE notice.ganmao END, notice.wendu = CASE WHEN notice.wendu <> notice_tmp.wendu THEN notice_tmp.wendu ELSE notice.wendu END WHERE notice.cid = notice_tmp.cid
